akn:section.akn:heading: Free passage to harbor of Michigan City, Indiana

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6. Free passage to harbor of Michigan City, Indiana The passage of vessels to and from the harbor of Michigan City, in Indiana, shall be free and not subject to toll or charge. (R.S. § 5247.)
Editorial Notes Codification R.S. § 5247 derived from acts June 23, 1866, ch. 138, § 1, 14 Stat. 73; Mar. 2, 1867, ch. 144, § 2, 14 Stat. 421.
